Developing and implementing features on server side.
Creating company custom UI library and writing documentation.
Technologies: JavaScript, Svelte, Node, Express, PHP, MongoDB, Cypress, Tailwind.
Building websites, web apps, implementing features, making existing projects more user friendly, beautiful, dynamic and responsive with cross-browser compability.
Developing projects with clean and reusable components with docs.
Also working on server side with backend apps and databases, but still more frontend heavy.
Working with a team, led by senior software engineers.
